channel.title: Legend of Code
channel.description: Recent content on Legend of Code

item.title: 005 Make Zsh Macos Default
item.description: Probably not necessary anymore now that ZSH is default in Catalina. But it’s still something I learned today. brew install zsh sudo sh -c "echo $(which zsh) >> /etc/shells" chsh -s $(which zsh)

item.title: How to delete a git tag
item.description: Delete remote tags $ git push origin :tag_name # or to be more precise git push --delete origin tag_name # or if there's a branch with the same name git push --delete origin :refs/tag/tag_name Delete local tags git tag --delete tag_name Source: https://stackoverflow.com/a/5480292

item.title: Create Hugo Theme Pt 3: Page Variables
item.description: In today’s episode, we learn how to generate a single page template using Page Variables.

item.title: Create Hugo Theme Pt 2: Modularisation
item.description: This part will deal with splitting templates up into smaller, re-usable modules.

item.description: There seems to be very little info out there about how to actually build a Hugo theme, not even in the official docs. So here’s my attempt.

item.title: Theme Design Dos And Do-Nots
item.description: When gathering requirements, it’s often just as helpful to define what are the things you shouldn’t do as much as the things you should do.

item.title: Hugo Theme Two
item.description: There doesn’t seem to be a lot of info out there about creating a theme in Hugo so I’ve been reading the docs to figure out how the various functions and variables work. So here’s a list of things I figured out while on a plane flying eight hours to attend my cousin’s wedding.

item.title: Writing my own Hugo theme
item.description: There’re billions upon billions of very well made themes for Hugo out there, so it’s a huge waste of my time to even attempt writing my own.

item.title: Thing I Learned

item.title: Introduction
item.description: I have been trying to write this intro for the past month now but I haven’t been able to write anything satisfactory, so this is pure stream of consciousness.
